item.title: KEYNOTE: Why the Neurodiversity Movement Will Change the World
item.description:
Description

"KEYNOTE: Why the Neurodiversity Movement Will Change the World" by: Mark Fister

Have you ever wondered whatâ€™s special about Einstein, Mozart, and Michelangelo?

Have you ever wondered if your company will ever go from Management to True Leadership?

Have you ever wondered if your company will ever be more equitable and inclusive of people who are different?

And what in tarnation do these three questions have to do with each other?

Come to this talk about the Neurodiversity Movement to find out.

Recorded at the 2021 Python Web Conference (https://2021.pythonwebconf.com)
item.dc:creator: Mark Fister
